Coronavirus disease (COVID-19) outbreak

Roche’s antibody test receives FDA Emergency Use Authorization

The Elecsys® Anti-SARS-CoV-2 Link: /us/en/products/params/elecsys-anti-sars-cov-2.html immunoassay can help determine if a patient has been exposed to the virus which causes COVID-19 and if the patient has developed antibodies against SARS-CoV-2.

Find Testing Sites Link: /us/en/landing-pages/elecsys--anti-sars-cov-2-testing-sites.html

We stand in solidarity What we challenge, we change. Roche stands with the Black community against racism, violence and injustice.

Learn more Link: /us/en/landing-pages/solidarity.html

Stay up to date on Roche’s response to COVID-19 (Coronavirus)

Access helpful resources such as customer communications, fact sheets, frequently asked questions, testing information and follow along with our blog.

Learn more Link: /us/en/landing-pages/roche-covid-19-updates.html

Real-time RT-PCR test

Detecting SARS-CoV-2 in currently infected patients with high sensitivity

The cobas® SARS-CoV-2 for use on the cobas® 6800/8800 Systems is a real-time RT-PCR test intended for the qualitative detection of nucleic acids from SARS-CoV-2 in clinician-instructed self-collected nasal swab specimens (collected on site), and clinician-collected nasal, nasopharyngeal, and oropharyngeal swab specimens from patients.

cobas® SARS-CoV-2 Test Link: /us/en/products/params/cobas-sars-cov-2-test.html
